content:
# The Stone Furnace status indicates "NO_INGREDIENTS," and the warning confirms that it has no ingredients to smelt. 
# However, it shows that it has produced 9 iron plates, which means it was able to smelt some of the iron ore before running into issues.

# The likely reason for the failure is that the furnace ran out of iron ore to smelt, as it only had 9 remaining when it needed 10 to produce a full batch.

# To resolve this, I will need to gather more iron ore and insert it into the furnace for smelting.

# 1. Let's locate the nearest iron ore resource again.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)

# 2. Move to the iron ore resource position to start harvesting more iron ore.
move_to(iron_ore_position)
